com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.offroute

Interface OffRouteCallback


  • public interface OffRouteCallback

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onShouldIncreaseIndex()
      This callback will fire when the OffRouteDetector determines that the user location is close enough to the upcoming LegStep.

    • Method Detail

      • onShouldIncreaseIndex

        void onShouldIncreaseIndex()
        This callback will fire when the OffRouteDetector determines that the user location is close enough to the upcoming LegStep.

        In this case, the step index needs to be increased for the next RouteProgress generation.
